pageDesc: Contracts where the awarded price significantly exceeds sector and category norms. IQR-based statistical detection normalized per sector and year baseline — extreme overpricing flags contracts above Q3 + 3× IQR.
totalAnomaliesDetail: Total flagged contracts across all sectors
totalFlaggedDetail: Total MXN value of anomalous contracts
extremeConfidenceDetail: Avg confidence for extreme overpricing type
sectorMapDesc: Price anomaly count by federal sector — sorted by volume
workbenchDesc: Sortable, filterable table of all price anomaly hypotheses. Click a row to inspect sector baseline context. Use the action buttons to mark hypotheses valid or invalid.
noResults: No price anomaly hypotheses match the current filters.
baselinesSubtitle: IQR thresholds used for anomaly detection (click to expand)
baselinesDesc: Statistical distribution of contract values per sector. The upper fence (Q3 + 1.5× IQR) is the outlier threshold; the extreme fence (Q3 + 3× IQR) triggers the extreme overpricing flag.
